name: DurationOfSymptom
title: Duration of Symptom
description: How long the person experiences the symptom on average, if symptom is not consistent / comes and goes. e.g., seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks. (Business ID: Entry 174034)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Duration of Symptom.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an how long the person experiences the symptom on average, if symptom is not consistent / comes and goes. e.g., seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Duration of Symptom.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Duration of Symptom.)

contains.display: Symptom duration during occurrences or episodes
